mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (subject, content, star, reservation_id, user_id) VALUES (#{subject}, #{content}, #{star}, #{reservation_id}, #{user_id})
mapper.select: SELECT r.id, reservation_id, r.user_id, subject, r.content, r.regdate, star, l.name AS leisure_name, rs.`date` AS reserve_date, rs.name AS reserve_name FROM review r INNER JOIN reservation rs ON (r.reservation_id = rs.id) INNER JOIN leisure l ON (rs.leisure_id = l.id) INNER JOIN `user` u ON (r.user_id = u.id) WHERE r.id = #{id}

SELECT r.id, reservation_id, r.user_id, subject, r.content, r.regdate, star, l.name AS leisure_name, rs.`date` AS reserve_date, rs.name AS reserve_name, l.id AS leisure_id, lf.file AS min_leisure_file FROM review r INNER JOIN reservation rs ON (r.reservation_id = rs.id) INNER JOIN leisure l ON (rs.leisure_id = l.id) INNER JOIN `user` u ON (r.user_id = u.id) INNER JOIN (SELECT leisure_id, min(id) AS leisure_file_id FROM leisure_file GROUP BY leisure_id) m_lf ON (l.id = m_lf.leisure_id) INNER JOIN leisure_file lf ON (lf.leisure_id = m_lf.leisure_id AND lf.id = m_lf.leisure_file_id) ORDER BY r.id DESC

SELECT l.name AS leisure_name , rs.`date`AS reserve_date, rs.name AS reserve_name FROM reservation rs INNER JOIN leisure l ON (rs.leisure_id = l.id) INNER JOIN `user` u ON (rs.user_id = u.id) WHERE rs.id = #{reservation_id}
